text: Anyday is a rock band from Springdale, Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada.[1] The band's music falls into the pop rock music genre.[2] The three members of the band are Glenn Thomas, Devin Robinson, and Clint Curtis.[3] The band formed in 2009.[4] On November 14, 2009, Anyday performed alongside Kellie Loder at a benefit concert at Springdale's Indian River High School.[5] The band signed with Nashville, Tennessee, United States-based Contemporary Christian record label Broken Records in 2010.[6]
